resources.string:
Welcome to the Enhanced Student Enrollment App!

This app allows you to:
- Register and log in securely
- Enroll in subjects manually
- View your enrollment summary and credit limits
Enjoy a seamless and user-friendly experience!

This app is an enhanced student enrollment system that allows you to register, log in, enroll in subjects, and view your enrollment summary and credit limits. Enjoy a seamless and user-friendly experience!
Welcome to the Enhanced Enrollment App!
